<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105167</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105167</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086023</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Saying "yes" instead of "no"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"ja" sagen anstelle von "nicht"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dire "oui" au lieu de "pas"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dizer "sim" em vez de "não"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dire "sì" anziché "no"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να πει "ναι" αντί "του κανενόσ"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El decir "sí" en vez de "no"</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Fair Use Guidelines make room for students and teachers to use copyrighted material in multimedia presentations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Angemessene Gebrauch-Korrekturlinien bilden Raum, 
damit Kursteilnehmer und Lehrer Urheberrecht gesichertes Material in 
den Multimediadarstellungen benutzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les directives justes d'utilisation font de la 
place pour que des étudiants et des professeurs utilisent le 
matériel garanti les droits d'auteur dans des présentations de 
multimédia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os guidelines justos do uso fazem o quarto para 
que estudantes e os professores usem o material copyrighted em 
apresentações dos multimedia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La guida di riferimento giusta di uso fa la stanza
affinchè gli allievi e gli insegnanti usi il materiale copyrighted 
nelle presentazioni di multimedia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι δίκαιες οδηγίες χρήσης κάνουν το χώρο για τους 
σπουδαστές και οι δάσκαλοι στη χρήση το υλικό στις παρουσιάσεις 
πολυμέσων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las guías de consulta justas del uso hacen el 
sitio para que los estudiantes y los profesores utilicen el material 
copyrighted en presentaciones de las multimedias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CONNIE BAKKER
FN:CONNIE BAKKER
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086023</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105167</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/saying-yes-instead-of-no</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
